summary: Sexy Ebony, Ebony Mail, and Nightingale armors with transparencies
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1/2: added Nightingale Sleeveless 2.0 also with NO CAPE version
       added Ebony Mail 2.0, weight slider now working correctly
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
*****Nightingale Elven Crafted Silver Mail 2.0 with NO CAPE version*****

uploaded to it\'s own site at:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2974
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description
3 different sets, female only. These armors do not require a nude body mod (unless you want nipples showing):
Ebony - craftable
Ebony Mail - Boethiah\'s Calling Quest -- You can add the Ebony Mail armor in console \"player.additem 52794 1\"
Nightingale - Thieve\'s Guild Quest
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Female Ebony armor with transparency alpha and skin/body mesh.
It is playable as an alpha version but there is some clipping on NPCs when her head is turned to the extreme left/right. There is some clipping at arm straps on player characters.

Female Nightingale armor with transparency alpha and skin/body mesh.

Female Ebony Mail armor, with blue satin lace corset. Less revealing, short top. I had to use the same mesh for both cuirassf_1.nif and cuirassf_0.nif so the weight slider won\'t work very well on this one but there\'s far less clipping.

For Jarl Elisif the Fair\'s sexy negligee go to:  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2698

This file is now free to use and/or modify within Nexus community, just credit me as applicable.
If anyone needs the psd for any of these mods so they can alter or correct them just send me a message.

Note about clipping issues: Clipping is where the body mesh shows through the armor mesh. For now there\'s not a lot that I can fix until the Skyrim Blender files are done. Some of them can be worked around by entering console command ~showracemenu then moving the weight slider.

Change log:
------------------------------------------------------------
11/26: Added cuirass_0 for \"thin\" characters
added less revealing version with no leg skin showing and black loincloth
corrected texture at wrists
11/27: Added female Nightingale armor.
Corrected normal map to fix glossy cape.
11/29: Added female Ebony Mail armor.
Edited ebony mail texture.
1/2: Added new mesh for Nightingale, eliminates most of the clipping issues. Also no cape version optional file.
Added Ebony Mail new mesh, weight slider now working correctly. Edit: removed to correct dismemberment problem at legs.
1/8: Reloaded Ebony Mail with corrected dismemberments.

The nude mod I used for the screenshots only and it is not part of this mod is -
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70 but you can use any, or none. If you don\'t want any nipples showing don\'t use a nude body mod.


Thaks to templar666 for figuring out how to apply alpha transparencies in nifskope
and thaks to Bethesda for another great game.
author: DizzasterJuice
